title: The carpet areas for AH/R&R tenements to be constructed shall be as required for EWS, LIG and MIG as decided by Govt
clause_text: The carpet areas for AH/R&R tenements to be constructed shall be as required for EWS, LIG and MIG as decided by Govt. from time to time subject to a minimum 25 sq. m
section: Development of AH/R&Ron private plot or plot of authority other than Govt./MCGM/Appropriate Authority.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The carpet areas for AH/R&R tenements to be constructed shall be as required for EWS, LIG and MIG as decided by Govt. from time to time subject to a minimum 25 sq. m
